frontmatter.author: Lawrence M. Krauss
frontmatter.title: The lack of understanding of something is not evidence for God.  It's evidence of lack of understanding.

frontmatter.author: Jonathan Safran Foer
frontmatter.title: Food choices are determined by many factors, but reason (even consciousness) is not generally high on the list.

frontmatter.author: Christopher Hitchens
frontmatter.title: What can be asserted without evidence can also be dismissed without evidence.

frontmatter.author: Christopher Hitchens
frontmatter.title: How do I know that I know this except that I have always been taught this and never heard anything else?
